name: The Secret Saturdays: Beasts of the 5th Sun
name_original: The Secret Saturdays: Beasts of the 5th Sun
description:
THE SECRET SATURDAYS: BEASTS OF THE 5TH SUN is the only video game based on the hit action-adventure television series from Cartoon Network, THE SECRET SATURDAYS. Players take control of Zak Saturday and his family the Saturdays, scientific explorers dedicated to discovering and protecting secret artifacts and mysterious creatures known as Cryptids. Using Zak’s unique powers and The Claw to battle enemies and swing through exciting environments, players will find, collect and interact with more than 30 never-before-seen Cryptids. Along the way, players can record the details of each find in their very own Cryptipedia. Fun puzzle elements allow players to locate hidden Cryptids and discover new paths as they fight against V.V. Argost’s evil plot to control the Cryptids and rule the world.

Features

• Explore 7 action packed levels in amazing worldly environments, from dangerous jungles to lost undersea cities
• Control Zak Saturday and use the Claw to battle enemies and grapple and swing through huge, exciting levels
• Multiple playable characters includes the entire Saturdays family and key Cryptids
• Find and collect over 30 never before seen, all new Cryptids
• Fight recognizable enemies from the show including Van Rook, Piecemeal, Munya and V.V. Argost
• Fun puzzle elements allow you to locate hidden Cryptids and discover new paths
• Use the Cryptipedia to record detailed specs of each Cryptid
• Original storyline based on THE SECRET SATURDAYS TV series
